Readings

In-Class Readings

Readings mentioned specifically in class will be listed here as the course progresses.

Week 1 - Biogeography

Freshwater paths across the ocean: Molecular Phylogeny of the frog Pychadena newtoni gives insights into amphibian colonization of oceanic islands by G. John Measey et al. Journal of Biogeography 34 (1) 2007.

Nepalese origin of cholera epidemic in Haiti by R. R. Frerichs et al. Clinical Microbiology and Infection 18 (6) 2012.

Week 3 - Evolution

Pelvic girdle and fin of Tiktaalik roseae by Neil H. Shubin, Edward B. Daeschler, and Farish A. Jenkins Jr. PNAS 111 (3) 2014.

Week 4 - Population Genetics

Gene Frequency in Small Populations of Mutant Drosophila by Peter Buri. Evolution 10 (4) 1956.

Week 6 - Cell Biology & Gene Expression

Qunatitative dissection of the simple repression input-output function by Hernan G. Garcia and Rob Phillips PNAS 108 (29) 2011.

Week 7 - The Body Plan

Diffussion and scaling during early embryonic pattern formation by Thomas Gregor et al. PNAS 102 (51) 2005.
